title: San Diego/Downtown
name: San Diego Padres
directions: in the East Village neighborhood, near the Gaslamp Quarter
price: Tickets $10-$60, depending on section and date of game; ballpark tours $11 adults, $9 military, $8 seniors, $7 children
content: See the Major League Baseball Padres play at '''PETCO Park'''. The stadium, modeled after other "retro" ballparks, has many unique elements, such as the Western Metal Supply Co. building (a historic warehouse) which is incorporated into the left-field seats. Price range for tickets varies widely, from $10-$15 for a spot on the grassy lawn beyond the outfield wall (the "Park at the Park") to over $50 for a seat behind home plate. Ballpark tours are available off-season daily at 10:30AM and 12:30PM, with an extra 2:30PM tour on Saturdays.
